citations.narrative:
The interior walls behind the rabbit enclosures have an excessive amount of reddish-brown streaks of rabbit urine. A urine
smell was noted upon entering the building. The rabbit building must be cleaned as often as necessary to minimize odors
for the health and well-being of the rabbits. Correct by 2/18/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The interior walls behind the rabbit enclosures have an excessive amount of reddish-brown streaks of rabbit urine. A urine 
smell was noted upon entering the building. The rabbit building must be cleaned as often as necessary to minimize odors 
for the health and well-being of the rabbits. Correct by 2/18/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
